---
title: "Heme explorer"
output: html_document
---

`r num_datasets` structures of heme with a resolution
of Å of better from the PDB. Classified according to C-C distances in
neighbouring vinyl and methyl groups

Use the mousewheel to zoom. Click on a point to see the structure.

```{r, echo=FALSE, fig.width=10, fig.height=7}
library(scatterD3)
tooltips <- paste(d$Filename,"<br />x: ", d$CBC.CMC, "<br />y: ", d$CBB.CMB)
urls <- paste("uglymol.html?id=",d$Filename)
col_var <- km$size[km$cluster]
scatterD3(d$CBC.CMC, d$CBB.CMB,
    xlab="||CBC - CMC|| (Å)",
    ylab="||CBB - CMB|| (Å)",
    point_opacity=0.3,
    col_var=col_var,
    col_lab="Number of structures",
    tooltip_text=tooltips,
    url_var=urls)
```
